STORY: A mountain-sized stone is known as a boulder.
Burn enough charcoal and you'll have a mountain of ash.
Everybody tries to enter the road during rush hour. That's why it's so crowded.
Parting with your money will lead to poverty.
Think of the classic anime 風の 谷のナウシカ (Nausicaa of the Valley of the Wind). We see Nausicaa entering the valley mouth gliding on an umbrella.
The mountain man uses the water from the valley to bathe.
Imagine a house big enough to contain an entire valley. might want to live there.
An ice cube is melting, loosing the water it contained.

Guess what? Japanese has dirty words too! (In fact, a lot of them) A sexual story is NOT inappropriate here, as this kanji is very sexual, such as in 性欲 ; lust. As for a story: the lack of contact with a woman's valley will leave a man LONGING for love.
